datatable.title: PUBLIC CONTRACTS
datatable.publicationDate: Date of publication of the contract notice
datatable.noOfCompaniesWhoDownloadedTenderDoc: Nr. of the EO that have downloaded the tender dossier
datatable.publicationDateOfGivenContract: Date of publication of the contract award notice
datatable.cancellationNoticeDate: Date of publication of cancellation of notice
datatable.name: Name of the EO to whom the contract is awarded
datatable.implementationDeadline: Date of commencement of contract implementation
datatable.totalAmountOfContractsIncludingTaxes: Total value of the contract, including all taxes

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description1:
Opening the municipality to citizens is the primary goal of the Municipality of Prishtina.

The Municipality of Prishtina, with the development of the ‘Open Contracts’ platform, is providing all of its citizens with open data regarding the contracts that this institution signs with all economic operators. This platform enables coverage of all contracts by municipal directorates, so that these records are further used in the function of full transparency in the municipality.

Returning citizens’ trust to public institutions through transparency and easy access to municipal services is our vision for Prishtina.
aboutUs.description2:
The information is listed as follows:

-Title of the procurement activity
-Date of publication of the contract notice
-Number of economic operators that have downloaded the tender dossier
-Date of publication of the contract award notice
-Date of publication of cancellation of notice
-Estimated value of the contract
-Name of the economic operator to whom the contract is awarded
-Date of contract signing
-Date of commencement of contract implementation
-Date of contract termination
-Total value of the contract, including all taxes
-Directorate to which the contract belongs to
aboutUs.projectDescription:
The “Open Contracts” platform has been developed under the Techstitution project in close partnership with the Municipality of Prishtina. The purpose of this platform is to inform the citizens of the Municipality of Prishtina on the procurement processes/contracts signed by this institution.
Techstitution essentially involves the commitment of young people to delivering digital solutions by motivating them to contribute to the good of the society by acquiring knowledge in programming. The developers of the prototype of this platform were fifty (50) young participants, who were beneficiaries of the workshops organized under this program.
The technologies used to develop the “Open Contracts” platform are: MongoDb, NodeJS, ExpressJS and Angular.
